history.narrative: Law 2-96 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-111, which was referred to the Committee on Education, Recreation and Youth Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 18, 1978, and May 2, 1978, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 26, 1978, it was assigned Act No. 2-200 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
